algorithm: The new algorithm, named "Modified Square Root Algorithm," assigns scores to the bins by calculating the square root of the ratio of the item size to the remaining capacity of the bins, aiming to prioritize bins with smaller remaining capacity and minimize the number of used bins by assigning the item to the bin with the maximum score.
code:
import numpy as np

def score(item: int, bins: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    # Calculate the ratio of item size to remaining bin capacity
    ratios = item / bins
    
    # Calculate the scores using the square root of the ratios
    scores = np.sqrt(ratios)
    
    return scores
